description:
With five girls now in his care, Satou needs to find more permanent lodging. Unfortunately his real estate ventures will have to wait, as the city comes under attack by giant insects!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: City Defense That Began with a Death March
Death March kara Hajimaru Toshi Bouei
La défense de la ville venant d’une death march
デスマーチからはじまる都市防衛
